publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4520 Margaret Jamieson: "Choices for Life" Anthem—That the Parliament congratulates Grange Academy choir from Kilmarnock who, assisted by John Richardson, recorded the anthem, composed by John McLaughlin, for this year’s national "Choices for Life" event at the SECC, which delivered the message to primary seven pupils about alcohol, drugs and healthy living and was organised by the Scottish Drug Enforcement Agency. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4520 Margaret Jamieson: "Choices for Life" Anthem—That the Parliament congratulates Grange Academy choir from Kilmarnock who, assisted by John Richardson, recorded the anthem, composed by John McLaughlin, for this year’s national "Choices for Life" event at the SECC, which delivered the message to primary seven pupils about alcohol, drugs and healthy living and was organised by the Scottish Drug Enforcement Agency.
S2M-4520 "Choices for Life" Anthem (lodged on 8 June 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4520 "Choices for Life" Anthem (lodged on 8 June 2006) Trish Godman*
S2M-4520 "Choices for Life" Anthem (lodged on 8 June 2006) Linda Fabiani*
